title: Definitions
context: [ยง350B-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context clearly requires otherwise: &ldquo;Advisory committee&rdquo; means the component of the Hawaii children&rsquo;s trust fund coalition that serves in an advisory capacity to the trust fund and the department of health. &ldquo;Board&rdquo; means the Hawaii children&rsquo;s trust fund advisory board. &ldquo;Child abuse and neglect&rdquo; has the same meaning as &ldquo;child abuse or neglect&rdquo; as defined in section 350-1. &ldquo;Coalition&rdquo; means the Hawaii children&rsquo;s trust fund coalition. &ldquo;Primary prevention&rdquo; means efforts targeting the general population designed to promote the general welfare of children and families prior to any occurrence of abuse or neglect. &ldquo;Secondary prevention&rdquo; means efforts targeting children and families that are considered, because of their life situations, to be at risk of abuse or neglect. &ldquo;Trust fund&rdquo; or &ldquo;fund&rdquo; means the Hawaii children&rsquo;s trust fund. [L 1993, c 336, pt of ยง2]
